constituent: crime, pack of wild dogs, fingerprint
koohiiStory1: Crimes can often be solved using the tools of dogs and fingerprints.
koohiiStory2: This crime gang has yet to be caught because their pack of wild dogs takes care of licking off the fingerprints from all the crime scenes.
words:
犯す(おかす): to commit, to perpetrate, to violate, to rape
犯罪(はんざい): crime
犯人(はんにん): offender, criminal
防犯(ぼうはん): prevention of crime
